articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Golden State Warriors crush Boston Celtics to win NBA title
articles.description: A dazzling performance from Stephen Curry powered the Golden State Warriors to a seventh NBA Finals crown on Thursday, securing a 103-90 victory over the Boston Celtics to clinch a 4-2 series triumph.

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Domestic indices eye worst week since May 2020 on policy worries
articles.description: Domestic indices extended losses to a sixth straight session on Friday and were set for their worst week in over two years, with investors spooked by rapid increases in policy rates by central banks globally in their bid to tame surging inflation.

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Vladimir Putin's health: Pivotal yet shrouded in uncertainty
articles.description: Over the course of Putin's two decades in power, remarkably little has emerged about his health, beyond the famous images provided by the Kremlin showing him bare-chested in a bid to project an image of macho strength.
